main event: A civilian observed a large reddish-orange object moving silently across the sky in Petersburg, Virginia on June 12, 1966.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 75 feet in size with a white light around the edges., The observer described the object's color as changing from red to orange., The object did not appear to follow the curvature of the horizon and then disappeared in the distance., The entire sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds., The observer estimated the speed of the object to be about 1,000 mph and its distance to be 1,500 - 2,000 ft away.
